# ISO 9241-112 Clause 6 â€“ Organization of Information

Key reminders:
- Group data by task frequency, chronology, or dependency.
- Keep primary tasks above the fold and reduce cognitive jumps.
- Align headings, spacing, and iconography with their importance level.
- Provide clear entry points for exceptional cases (alerts, errors).

Use this note when prioritizing dashboard fixes or defending a new information hierarchy.
